import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { registerClickAway } from 'helpers/click-away' export default function NavBar () { const [open, setOpen] = useState() function showMenu(menu) { setOpen(menu) } useEffect(() => { if (open) registerClickAway(() => { setOpen(null) }) }, [open]) return (
